external_games.name: Kings and Generals: A Divided Loyalty
Kings and Generals: A Divided Loyalty

name: Kings and Generals: A Divided Loyalty
summary: Kings and Generals: A Divided Loyalty is a 16-bit RPG Visual Novel with a deep and immersive storyline that will truly satisfy the fans of classic JRPGs like Final Fantasy, Suikoden, and Grandia.
